name: SSF10
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 10
subtitle: Sicca Syndrome
notes: **Note**:   Code any history of Sicca syndrome as documented by the physician or coded in the medical record. Sicca syndrome is an eye condition in which there is decreased tear production and inflammation of the cornea and conjunctiva that may be associated with connective tissue diseases.
